item.title: COVID-19 SAFE BORDER PROJECT
item.description: Covid-19 is a unique challenge in living memory. Responding to the pandemic has been a challenge for policy-makers around the world. We build an interactive, dynamic visualization of the risk of opening New Zealand’s borders up to low, medium, high, and Covid-free countries.
